name: MIKE GREIM
title: Lead Software Engineer (Active Secret Clearance)
summary: Lead Software Engineer with 6+ years experience delivering mission-critical Java/Spring microservices. Expert in architecting secure GovCloud infrastructure, AI-driven tools, and Terraform-managed environments.

bullets.title: AI Automation Leadership
bullets.text: Led a 4-engineer squad architecting an AI-powered schema and parsing code generation tool (React/LLM); managed sprint planning and technical story breakdown while partnering with Product stakeholders to productize the prototype into a core commercial offering.

bullets.title: Cloud & Analytics
bullets.text: Built a critical uptime monitoring system for government clients; directed the deployment of secure, Terraform-managed infrastructure (Superset, Redshift, Keycloak) on AWS GovCloud, implementing GitLab CI pipelines that reduced deployment time from hours to minutes.

bullets.title: Technical Strategy
bullets.text: Defined engineering standards for company-wide AI adoption (Claude Code); aligned leadership stakeholders on tooling best practices that unified development patterns across the organization.

bullets.title: Mission-Critical Event Systems
bullets.text: Enhanced the Air Force command and control suite by maintaining an asynchronous event management service (produce/consume/replay) using Java, Spring, RabbitMQ, and Redis; managed SQL persistence and ensured system stability through rigorous TDD and integration testing.

bullets.title: Full-Stack Architecture
bullets.text: Engineered scalable microservice features for a 250k+ DAU social platform using React, Java Spring, and AWS.

bullets.title: Notification System Architecture
bullets.text: Designed and built persistent cross-user messaging engine driving engagement for tens of thousands of users; defined the logic for follow suggestions and complex comment interactions.

bullets.title: Operational Excellence
bullets.text: Established robust monitoring and testing protocols using New Relic, Sumo Logic, and regression testing; served as a primary on-call engineer to minimize platform downtime.

bullets.title: Team Development
bullets.text: Mentored 2 junior engineers through pair programming and code reviews, elevating team code quality and reducing production defects.

bullets.title: Greenfield Engineering
bullets.text: Promoted from Associate in <1 year while engineering the next-gen enterprise risk platform from scratch using React, Redux, Java, and SQL; helped drive the company's transition to a modern stack.

bullets.title: Full Lifecycle Development
bullets.text: Engaged in the complete software development lifecycle (SDLC), translating customer feedback into feature concepts, assisting with sprint planning and ticket breakdown, and executing code delivery.

bullets.title: Frontend Engineering
bullets.text: Built interactive 3D marketing applications for global B2B brands using JavaScript, SCSS, and proprietary 3D APIs.

education: AWS Certified Developer - Associate | CompTIA Security+ (2023)
B.A. Economics & Organizational Studies, Pitzer College (2013)
